timeline.content:
Hello Geovanna, thank you for contacting Amber Student for your accommodation search in London! As the official partner of UCL, we‚Äôre here to ensure you find the perfect place to stay.

I‚Äôm Shikha, and I‚Äôll be guiding you through the process. Please let me know a convenient time to connect so we can move forward with discussing and exploring your preferred accommodation options.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Thankyou
